entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
